oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1947-11-29 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of excerpts from a Prince Albert sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (9:30-10:00 pm) from November 29, 1947. Featuring Louie Buck (announcer), with Red Foley (host/performer) and performers the Old Hickory Singers, Bill Monroe, and Minnie Pearl. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Old Hickory Singers; Bill Monroe; Minnie Pearl; Red Foley
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Red Foley introduces Claude Sharpe and the Old Hickory Singers -- Old Grey Bonnet (Old Hickory Singers) -- Red Foley introduces Louie Buck -- Prince Albert commercial (Louie Buck) (incomplete) -- [break] -- Red Foley introduces Bill Monroe -- Goodbye Old Pal (Bill Monroe) -- Red Foley introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Red Foley talks -- Going Home (Red Foley) -- Louie Buck talks (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996; Sharpe, Claude, 1902-1969; Old Hickory Singers; Minnie Pearl; Ross, Joey (Musician); Turner, Zeke; Buck, Louis, 1910-1971;
